name: Beyond Religion - Ex-2x2 Stories of Deconstruction

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Paul Abenroth
episodes.description:
Paul takes us on a journey that spans more than 80 years. After spending 10 years in the ministry in the Washington State region during the 1960s, he brings a wealth of knowledge and firsthand insight into the inner workings of the 2x2 church. Hearing how his beliefs have evolved over the decades, and where he stands today, is a powerful reminder that we never have to settle for beliefs that don’t resonate with us at our core.

Want to support the project? https://coff.ee/beyondreligion

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Lindsay
episodes.description:
Lindsay shares about the unique experience of growing up on convention grounds in Eastern Canada and the complications of such a situation. We also talk about questioning the foundations of her Christian beliefs, which didn't hold up under scrutiny once she gave herself permission to view them outside of the 2x2 lens.

Lindsay's DeCult 2024 Story Jam segment: https://youtu.be/3idlXWpZD6E?t=1599
Cult Chat podcast featuring Lindsay and Veronica: https://youtu.be/HVlAJN-wETs?si=kL-pvmViOWo8GNkF

Want to support the project? https://coff.ee/beyondreligion

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Kris Grooms
episodes.description:
Kris takes us through her journey of growing up 2x2 and a lifetime of pushing up against the boundaries that kept being imposed upon her. Now navigating leaving the church, marriage tension, and religious deconstruction, Kris acknowledges she doesn't have all the answers and is learning how to accept that it's ok to exist in the place of not knowing.

Want to support the project? https://coff.ee/beyondreligion

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Kyle Eggleton
episodes.description:
Kyle shares about the contrasts he experienced between the early days of childhood in rural New Zealand, to the jarring realities of moving to the city and learning that there are many more meetings to sit through in the mainstream 2x2 world. We also talk about his path from 2x2ism to Presbyterianism and ultimately to atheism, along with his work in the medical field and how that has translated into the 2x2/cult recovery space.

The cult recovery workbook mentioned by Kyle in this episode is *Walking Free from the Trauma of Coercive, Cultic and Spiritual Abuse* by Gillie Jenkinson

Want to support the project? https://coff.ee/beyondreligion

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Kyle Hanks
episodes.description:
Kyle and I took a little time to reminisce about growing up in the same field and talk about the 2x2 youth scene in that area. From there we transition to Kyle’s evolving beliefs and his observations of the Christian world that have led him to seek meaning beyond religion.

Kyle’s podcast - Cowtipper Vern’s Ex-2x2 Review: https://www.youtube.com/@CowTipperVern-ex-2x2 

Mormon Stories Episodes Featuring Kyle and Kari
Part 1: https://youtu.be/gQwRHjQX5ec?si=kahVqIlX6_nfuBmF
Part 2: https://youtu.be/qExHrv-1aPs?si=kE0AeRrD2vx3gPji

Want to support the project? https://coff.ee/beyondreligion
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Dennis Pearce
episodes.description:
Dennis shares about his experiences growing up in the 2x2s in Alaska, and later down to Washington state for college. He talks about how he never felt like the church was able to give him answers about life and belief that were satisfactory, and instead he took a journey of exploration to find meaning and connection in the outside world.

Want to support the project? https://coff.ee/beyondreligion

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Louisa Dykstra
episodes.description:
Louisa takes us through her journey of growing up in the 2x2s, all the way into early parenthood, when she stepped out of the only way of life she'd ever known.

The book referenced by Louisa in the interview about past life regression is "Many Lives, Many Masters" by Brian Weiss.

 Want to support the project? https://coff.ee/beyondreligion

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Abbi & Mike
episodes.description:
In this final episode of the "season" (We'll be back later in the year with another batch of weekly episodes), Abbi and I chat about our own beliefs and the journey of discovery we've taken together. 

Abbi and Mike's TikTok channel about all things 2x2: https://www.tiktok.com/@our2x2story 

Want to support the project? https://coff.ee/beyondreligion

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Casey Dumaresq
episodes.description: Casey takes us through a fascinating journey of growing up with "unequally yoked" parents, leaving the 2x2s and exploring a previously unknown side of Christianity, then eventually coming to the realization that God doesn't exist, and our purpose is in the here and now!

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Alex Chew
episodes.description:
Alex experienced a childhood that is unlike the average 2x2 childhood, being split between the 2x2 version of Christianity, and the more mainstream version provided by their Christian schooling. It was a fascinating journey with Alex through their deconstruction and the many events that led them to where they are today!


Want to support the project? https://coff.ee/beyondreligion

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Ted
episodes.description:
Ted and I had a great conversation about his experiences growing up in a relatively 2x2-dense area of Montana, and the questions that began growing in his mind in his late teens and into college. While many in the ex-2x2 community know him as Mike Oxlong from The Millstone Facebook group (and Youtube channel of the same name), it was great to get to know the man behind the dress shirt, tie, and soft "mmhmm".

The Millstone on Youtube: https://youtube.com/@UCuiGJ-GyKyg_t-KdW8Xdg_A

Want to support the project? https://coff.ee/beyondreligion

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Donna Kennedy
episodes.description: It was fascinating to hear Donna's story of being raised in the 2x2 church and hopping in and out at various points throughout her life, before leaving for good when her son began asking questions that she wasn't able to answer.

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Rob Ryan
episodes.description:
Rob takes us through the ups and downs of his 2x2 experience. From being a good professing boy, to the cracks in his faith that began showing up through adulthood and ending with one of the most unforgivable sins in the 2x2 church: Divorce.

Many thanks to Rob for sharing so honestly and vulnerably!

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Jared Snyder
episodes.description:
Jared candidly shares his personal journey, reflecting on his time in the ministry and events that led to his decision to leave. He offers honest insights from behind the veil of the ministry and the impact it had on his life and beliefs.

Jared's thoughts and stories can be found on his Substack, Jared3.0 - https://jared3point0.substack.com

The work of his wife, Jen, can be found here - https://substack.com/@jensnyder1

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Meliesa Tigard
episodes.description:
Meliesa takes us on a journey through her experience growing up in the 2x2s, and into her experience as a worker for a short time. Her experiences led her down a winding path from the 2x2 version of Christianity, to new age spirituality, and ultimately embracing the unknown.

Meliesa has written a book that allegorizes her 2x2 experience, which I highly recommend. "Little Mouse and the Purple Door" can be found on Amazon here: https://a.co/d/3AkeImr

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Laura McConnell Conti
episodes.description:
In this episode, Laura McConnell Conti shares her journey of growing up in the 2x2 church, breaking away and embracing the secular world. We also discuss her ongoing work speaking out about the 2x2 church and advocating for cult survivors, offering support and raising awareness through her writing and other media.

You can learn more about Laura's work related to the 2x2s and cult activism at the links below.
Substack: https://lauramcconnell.substack.com/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lauramc.au
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@truth2x2survivor
Truth 2x2 Cult Kids Podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/nz/podcast/truth-2x2-cult-kids/id1788240941

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Kristen McLeod
episodes.description:
Kristen shares her experience of being pulled into the 2x2 church at a young age, having to grow up in the duality of a "broken home", and the process of reclaiming herself in adulthood.

Kristen's Substack, on which she reflects on aspects of her past and present, can be found here: https://kristenhmcleod.substack.com.

Her work can also be found on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@CultivatedWithKristen and her website https://www.kristenhmcleod.com.

episodes.title: Beyond Religion with Dan
episodes.description: Join us to hear Dan's story of growing up in the 2x2 church, his departure from faith while raising a family and navigating a rocky marriage, and the journey of learning which has led him to where he's at today.

episodes.title: Introduction to Beyond Religion
episodes.description: Hopefully this helps provide some context for the existence of this channel! If you have any questions, leave them in the comments.
